text: Dear Seattle are an Australian indie rock band from the Northern Beaches of Sydney, New South Wales. The band consists of four members: Brae Fisher, Jeremy Baker, Lachlan Simpson and Josh McKay. They have one album and two EP released to date. The band have performed at many Australian Festivals including; Groovin The Moo, Unify Gathering, Festival Of The Sun and Party In The Paddock. ==History== Dear Seattle's formed n Sydney in 2013 and band began posting songs on Triple J's Unearthed, which gained them rotation across the Triple J network and helped the band gig their away around the nation finding fans all over the country. In February 2019, the band released their debut studio album, Don't Let Go which was produced by James Tidswell (Violent Soho). In 2019, Dear Seattle covered Missy Higgins "The Special Two" for Triple J's Like a Version. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" !
